description:
Nishikata receives his first cell phone and can`t wait to play tricks on Takagi-san.
He sends her a scary video to frighten her, but it doesn`t quite work. 
As usual, Takagi-san has the upper hand when it comes to teasing...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les portables / Histoires d`horreur / La photo
ケータイ / ホラー / 写真
